name: Touhou Blooming Chaos
description:
What is Touhou Blooming chaos? [/ h2]

A shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine, who has a constitution that attracts the incident-Reimu Hakurei went out and was taken to a different world like Gensokyo with mysterious power on the way back to the shrine.

Reimu was already used to being involved in various incidents. She immediately understood the current situation.

1. This is another parallel universe in the world of Gensokyo where she lives;
2. The time of this world is a world where spell card rules have just been established, unlike the world where she lives;
3. In front of her is a red fog incident;
4. Go to that red mansion and beat up them for the time being! !

With Fuda and equipment, Reimu, the ghost extermination expert, has gone on the path of resolving the incident again.

At the same time, an oriental wizard who regularly comes to see does Reimu eats rotten food and died, Marisa Kirisame, came to this world together.

When the strongest two join together, the peace of this world will not return again! !

——Punish everyone who disturbs you in this world with a Dream Lock!Barrage S • RPG game! [/ h2]

Operate Reimu and Marisa and fight against the enemies in the game with two-headed characters. Unlike regular shooting games, players can explore the map more freely.

All of the original BOSS spell cards are owned and there are many ways to deal with them.

There is also a new system! [/ b]
